metadata.description: Steve Mannion (Fearless Dawn, The Bomb) serves up a 52-page anthology containing four stories featuring the misadventures of legendary pirate Brownhole Jones and his crew of stooges. Also featuring the sexiest good girl on the seven seas, Sea-Goin' Lil, as well as Brownhole Jones' alter ego, Steampipe Johnny!
metadata.name: Strange Pirate Tales
